item.title: Pyperaptor
item.description: Release 0.1.1 PypeRaptor is a library that provides a functional pipeline structure. Each execution from the pipeline takes an input item from beginning to end and return the result. The Pipeline may be modified by add operator and expects a Node. To execute a Pipeline for a single item, user can execute push function with item. This execution will pushes the input through the pipeline calling every function in the way.
